cards.name: Titanic Foot Stomp
cards.rulesText: Deal 6 damage to an adjacent enemy and push it 2 squares.

cards.name: Earth-Shattering Roar
cards.rulesText: All enemies within 3 squares take 3 damage and are Stunned.

cards.name: Seismic Tail Swipe
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to one enemy and pull it 3 squares toward you.

cards.name: Regenerative Scales
cards.rulesText: Heal yourself 4 HP and gain Regenerating for 1 round.

cards.name: Immovable Stance
cards.rulesText: Until your next turn you cannot be pushed or pulled; enemies that enter an adjacent square are Immobilized.

cards.name: Predatory Lunge
cards.rulesText: Teleport 2 squares and deal 4 damage; target gains Bleeding.

cards.name: Rampage
cards.rulesText: Make a basic melee attack against every adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Savage Bite
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to one enemy and gain Focused.

cards.name: Titanic Regeneration
cards.rulesText: Remove all negative conditions from yourself and heal 2 HP.

cards.name: Terrifying Shriek
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage and push all enemies within 2 squares back 2.

cards.name: Cataclysmic Tail Whirl
cards.rulesText: Move 4 squares in a straight line; each enemy crossed takes 3 damage and is Knocked Down.

cards.name: Atomic Breath
cards.rulesText: Line 6: deal 7 damage; targets hit are Blinded.

cards.name: Wild Smash
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage and swap places with the target.
